craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: Contributing to a kill grants the holder +10 additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 3).

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: The holder's spells heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: The holder's basic attacks restore 5 Mana on-hit.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Basic attacks heal the holder for 40% of the damage dealt.

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 200% Attack Range, and their Basic Attacks can’t miss.

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 65 magic damage to 3 enemies. This effect can now critically strike, and its crits reduce the Magic Resist of targets hit by 60% for 6 seconds.

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 80% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critical strike.

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 2 hexes for 1 second. When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 ★ Health arises and taunts all nearby enemies again.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 50 additional Spell Power.

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: When the holder casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 180 magic damage, plus 180 if they are crowd-controlled.

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300 / 350 / 400 ★ damage for 8 seconds.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] When the holder deals magic damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: The holder's spells can cause critical hits, and holder gains +40% bonus critical strike damage.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] After casting their spell, the wearer's Mana is set to 20.

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 50%. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Spell Power for the rest of combat.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs: At the begining of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic attacks and spells deal +40% Damage / Basic attacks and spells heal for 40% of damage dealt.

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs: Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Reduces incoming magic damage by 60%

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs: [Unique] The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 10 seconds of combat.

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for 4 seconds.

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equip 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]

embl.name: SwordoftheDivine
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains the Divine trait.

embl.name: DuelistsZeal
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains the Duelist trait.

embl.name: MantleofDusk
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains the Dragonsoul trait.

embl.name: MagesCap
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains the Mage trait.

embl.name: VanguardsCuirass
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains the Vanguard trait.

embl.name: ElderwoodHeirloom
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The holder gains the Elderwood trait.

embl.name: WarlordsBanner
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The wearer gains the Warlord trait.

embl.name: YoumuusGhostblade
embl.add_attrs: [Unique] The wearer gains the Assassin trait.

arti.name: AnimaVisage
arti.add_attrs: The wearer regenerates 8% of their maximum Health each second. +200 HP, +25 MR

arti.name: DeathsDefiance
arti.add_attrs: 60% of the damage the wearer receives is instead dealt over 5 seconds as non-lethal damage. +15 AD, +15 AS, +25 Armor

arti.name: EternalWinter
arti.add_attrs: Enemies who damage the wearer have their Attack Speed slowed by 35% for 2 seconds. After being slowed this way 7 time, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every 10 seconds. +200 HP, +25 Armor

arti.name: InfinityForce
arti.add_attrs: +33 AD, +33 AS, +33 AP, +33 Armor, +33 MR, +33 HP, +33% Critical Strike Chance

arti.name: Manazane
arti.add_attrs: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore 100 Mana over 4 seconds. +15 AD, +15 AS, +15 Mana

arti.name: ObsidianCleaver
arti.add_attrs: The wearer's attacks and spell damage shred enemy Armor and Magic Resistance by 40% for 3 seconds. +200 HP, +30 AD

arti.name: RanduinsSanctum
arti.add_attrs: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain 40 Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat. +25 Armor, +25 MR, +200 HP

arti.name: RocketPropelledFist
arti.add_attrs: At the start of combat, the wearer pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, stunning them for 1.50 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy. +15 Mana, +25 Armor, +200 HP

arti.name: GoldCollector
arti.add_attrs: The wearer executes enemies below 10% on hit. Executions gernerate 1 gold. +30 AD, +20% Critical Strike Chance

arti.name: ZhonyasParadox
arti.add_attrs: The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below 40% Health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for 2.50 seconds. +15 AP, +25 Armor, +25 MR
